data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1ypEr_DjNKcQ7kNvgE7N1sU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBC2H3ltv1ptAiZ_t5H_TrWGqUqxExniuMuekmdYRe_LQ&oe=664F26B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=T0w9jh5eA9IQ7kNvgEhfx-c&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvZpAkTjRi1Y6Kcb-CYRHKaMrt6KvpB7y0MUD0Bu5paw&oe=664F3452)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xZ8I1K-B4ZcQ7kNvgEiTNn-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvo90coRTArFh2vOV8KmIDtrHrtCaWaDvXFshgrgp9xA&oe=664F37D0)
